statements: SELECT * FROM testimonies;
SELECT survivor_name, abuse_type FROM testimonies WHERE location_of_abuse = 'Home';
SELECT * FROM testimonies ORDER BY date_of_abuse DESC;
SELECT testimony_id, survivor_name, location_of_abuse FROM testimonies WHERE abuse_type = 'Physical' AND location_of_abuse LIKE '%School%';
SELECT survivor_name, date_of_abuse FROM testimonies WHERE date_of_abuse > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_abuse ASC;
SELECT * FROM testimonies WHERE survivor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT survivor_name, date_of_abuse FROM testimonies WHERE location_of_abuse = 'London' ORDER BY date_of_abuse DESC
SELECT * FROM testimonies WHERE abuse_type IN ('physical', 'emotional') LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT testimony_id, survivor_name, date_of_abuse, location_of_abuse FROM testimonies WHERE date_of_abuse BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT survivor_name, COUNT(*) AS num_testimonies FROM testimonies GROUP BY survivor_name HAVING num_testimonies > 1 ORDER BY num_testimonies DESC
SELECT * FROM testimony WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id,title FROM testimony WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survivor WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name,occupation FROM survivor WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY occupation DESC;
SELECT id,name,location FROM survivor WHERE occupation LIKE 'Doctor%';
SELECT id, title, timestamp FROM testimony WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM testimony WHERE title LIKE '%war%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM survivor WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM survivor WHERE occupation = 'doctor';
SELECT id, name, location, occupation FROM survivor WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY location, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM testimony;
SELECT survivor_name, date_recorded FROM testimony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT investigator_name, specialization FROM investigator WHERE investigator_id = 2;
SELECT survivor_name, country FROM testimony JOIN location ON testimony.id = location.location_id;
SELECT * FROM testimony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, survivor_name FROM testimony WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-15';
SELECT location_name, country FROM location WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM investigator WHERE specialization = 'forensic science';
SELECT investigator_name, specialization FROM investigator ORDER BY investigator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM testimonies;
SELECT testimony_text, witness_name FROM testimonies ORDER BY recorded_datetime DESC;
SELECT survivor_name, age, gender FROM survivors WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE country='USA' AND location_name LIKE '%City%';
SELECT persecution_name FROM persecution_types ORDER BY persecution_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM testimonies;
SELECT testimony_text, recorded_datetime FROM testimonies WHERE witness_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT t.testimony_text, s.survivor_name FROM testimonies t INNER JOIN survivors s ON t.testimony_id = s.survivor_id;
SELECT testimony_text, witness_name, l.location_name FROM testimonies t JOIN locations l ON t.testimony_id = l.location_id;
SELECT t.testimony_text, p.persecution_name FROM testimonies t LEFT JOIN persecution_types p ON t.testimony_id = p.persecution_id;
SELECT * FROM testimonies;
SELECT testimony_id, survivor_name FROM testimonies WHERE date_of_testimony = '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_description, location_name, city, country FROM events JOIN locations ON events.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM perpetrators WHERE perpetrator_name LIKE '%John%';

SELECT testimony, perpetrator_name FROM testimonies JOIN testimonies_perpetrators ON testimonies.testimony_id = testimonies_perpetrators.testimony_id JOIN perpetrators ON testimonies_perpetrators.perpetrator_id = perpetrators.perpetrator_id;
SELECT * FROM testimonies ORDER BY date_of_testimony DESC;

SELECT t.testimony_id, t.survivor_name, p.perpetrator_name FROM testimonies t JOIN testimonies_perpetrators tp ON t.testimony_id = tp.testimony_id JOIN perpetrators p ON tp.perpetrator_id = p.perpetrator_id;
SELECT t.testimony_id, t.survivor_name, e.event_date, l.location_name FROM testimonies t JOIN events e ON t.testimony_id = e.event_id JOIN locations l ON e.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT t.survivor_name, COUNT(tp.perpetrator_id) AS num_perpetrators FROM testimonies t JOIN testimonies_perpetrators tp ON t.testimony_id = tp.testimony_id GROUP BY t.survivor_name;

SELECT t.survivor_name, p.perpetrator_name FROM testimonies t JOIN testimonies_perpetrators tp ON t.testimony_id = tp.testimony_id JOIN perpetrators p ON tp.perpetrator_id = p.perpetrator_id WHERE p.description LIKE '%violent%';
